name: Saplink
description:
Controls: W A S D & SpaceBar.

In Saplink, you control SeedBoy, the product of an experiment created to take control of other plants.
Another experiment from the same lab has grown out of control. This massive tree, named Eclipse, has grown to such a tremendous size that human life cannot survive in a majority of the Earth's Northern Hemisphere.
Lead SeedBoy back to the laboratory and stop Eclipse!
